Module SPM_HW1
Package com.spm.hw1.player

Class DataManager

java.lang.Object
com.spm.hw1.player.DataManager
public class DataManager extends Object
This DataManager class which is a singleton class that manages the data manipulation (CRUD), data analytics, and filtering operations by maintaining and returning a single instance of the class to avoid multiple simultaneous conflicting data operations and stores/manipulates the data from a data.txt file in the same root repository path of the application in a CSV format.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static DataManager getInstance()
      getInstance method used to return only a singular instance of the privatized class to implement the singleton functionality of the class.
      Returns:
      DataManager The DataManager Object instance formed in a synchronized format following a singleton pattern used for the creation of the instance. This would ensure that only one instance is created, and subsequent calls would reuse the existing instance.

    • readData

      Returns:
      List All the player Objects present in the data.txt file in a List format.

      public boolean editData(long id, com.spm.hw1.player.Player newData)
      To update the player data in the data.txt file by converting the record into a CSV format.
      Parameters:
      Integer - , i.e., the id of the player record.
      Player - , i.e., the target player object record is intended to update.
      Returns:
      Boolean, i.e., returns true and edit the record if the record with the specified id exists, or else returns false.
